description: As a user, I want to update my profile information so that my account details are current
acceptance_criteria: User can edit name and email; Changes are validated; Profile picture can be uploaded; Changes saved successfully; Confirmation message displayed

description: As a user, I want to manage my notification preferences so that I receive relevant updates
acceptance_criteria: User can access notification settings; Email preferences can be toggled; Push notification settings available; SMS preferences configurable; Settings saved and applied immediately
